short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to share text,images,content,links,pages,etc. to your twitter account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now no need to open every time your twitter account,log in and then tweet anything. You can directly share any selected text,image,link or any page directly to your twitter profile with this extension.
